question.passage: Johnson Manufacturing is a company that specializes in producing high-quality office furniture. The company was established in 1987 and has grown steadily since then. Johnson Manufacturing prides itself on using environmentally friendly materials and processes. The company’s headquarters are located in New York, but it has manufacturing plants in several states across the U.S. Johnson Manufacturing also exports its products to various countries around the world. The company’s success is largely attributed to its commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction. Over the years, Johnson Manufacturing has introduced several new product lines that have been well-received in the market. The company’s research and development team is constantly working on new designs and materials to keep up with changing customer preferences. In addition to its focus on product quality, Johnson Manufacturing also places a strong emphasis on employee development. The company offers various training programs and encourages its employees to pursue professional growth opportunities.

questions.questionText: What is one of the reasons for Johnson Manufacturing’s success?

options.B: It has manufacturing plants in several states.
options.C: It exports products to various countries.
options.D: It uses environmentally friendly materials and processes.

questions.questionText: What does Johnson Manufacturing focus on besides product quality?

options.D: Increasing the number of manufacturing plants.
